name: Edward
description: The phantom thief Gray Shadow disguised as a magician, a slummy noble. He never gives up the faith of robbing the rich and giving to the poor.

passiveSkill.name: Robin Hood
passiveSkill.description: ${d.lens5.skill ? d.lens5.skill : "When Edward appears, he steals 100% Rage from the enemy Spirit with the highest Rage and distributes it equally to all allied Spirits."}

uniqueSkill.name: Illusive Trick
uniqueSkill.description: ${d.lens4.skill ? d.lens4.skill : "Edward performs psychedelic card tricks, dealing DMG equal to {placeholder} of ATK and stealing all of the target's buff. Stealing has no effect on enemy leader. A success stealing grants 6% CRIT Rate for every stack. The effect lasts the entire battle and stacks up to 5 times."}

specialSkill.name: Hula
specialSkill.description: ${d.lens6.skill ? d.lens6.skill : "Edward deals DMG equal to {placeholder} of ATK to a single target. Before attacking, he steals 1 buff. Stealing has no effect on enemy leader. If it succeeds, it grants 12% CRIT Rate. The effect lasts the entire battle and cannot stack. Cast Rate: {placeholder}"}

normalSkill.name: Magic of Spades
normalSkill.description: Attacks a single enemy and deals ATK * {placeholder} damage.

templateData.lens4.skill: Edward performs psychedelic card tricks, dealing DMG equal to {placeholder} of ATK and stealing all of the target's buff. Stealing has no effect on enemy leader. A success stealing grants 6% CRIT Rate for every stack. The effect lasts the entire battle and stacks up to 5 times.
templateData.lens5.skill: When Edward appears, he steals 100% Rage from the enemy Spirit with the highest Rage and distributes it equally to all allied Spirits.
templateData.lens6.skill: Edward deals DMG equal to {placeholder} of ATK to a single target. Before attacking, he steals 1 buff. Stealing has no effect on enemy leader. If it succeeds, it grants 12% CRIT Rate. The effect lasts the entire battle and cannot stack. Cast Rate: {placeholder}
